price: 3. Y deposita tu confianza en Al-lah. Y Al-lah te basta como protector.
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
